code: import CartActionTypes from"./cart.types";export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:CartActionTypes.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:CartActionTypes.CLEAR_CART};};export var addCartToFirestoreStart=function addCartToFirestoreStart(cartItems){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_CART_TO_FIRESTORE_START,payload:cartItems};};export var fetchCartItemsFromFirestoreStart=function fetchCartItemsFromFirestoreStart(){return{type:CartActionTypes.FETCH_CART_ITEMS_FROM_FIRESTORE_START};};export var fetchCartItemsFromFirestoreSuccess=function fetchCartItemsFromFirestoreSuccess(cartItems){return{type:CartActionTypes.FETCH_CART_ITEMS_FROM_FIRESTORE_SUCCESS,payload:cartItems};};export var fetchCartItemsFromFirestoreFailure=function fetchCartItemsFromFirestoreFailure(error){return{type:CartActionTypes.FETCH_CART_ITEMS_FROM_FIRESTORE_FAILURE,payload:error};};
